clip.quote: The real estate market is cyclical, and you have to be prepared to work in both cycles.
clip.why_clipworthy: It challenges agents to adapt to market changes and highlights the importance of being versatile.
clip.suggested_hook: Are you prepared for the ups and downs of the real estate market?

    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Are you prepared for the ups and downs of the real estate market?",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) In today's episode, Donald Hyun Kiolbassa discusses why real estate agents must adapt to market cycles to thrive.",
